GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v4.19.262
GSD.description:
crypto: cavium - prevent integer overflow loading firmware

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.262 by commit 90e483e7f20c32287d2a9da967e122938f52737a, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 9e2c7d99941d000a36f68a3594cec27a1bbea274. For more details please see the references link.
